fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of what you're selling?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Funnel Scripts, Click Funnels, Super Keyword Scraper, Selling Your Home Alone, Speaker Goldmine, PT Test Success, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What exactly are you selling?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Software, Home Study Course, Book, Executive Coaching, Done-for-you Service, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Your Name

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Russell Brunson, Jim Edwards

fields.fieldTitle: Keyword Theme: in 2-3 words, what is the area of focus for this product, service, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: "In a nutshell, this product, service, etc. is focused on the area of ________"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: public speaking, content marketing, fitness testing, podcasting, public domain content, online business, freelance bookkeeping, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 thing the audience really wants related to the product, service, etc. topic?

fieldHint.hint1: Start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get more speaking gigs; get more traffic; do more pushups; get more subscribers; increase market share, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the 2nd thing the audience really wants related to the product, service, etc. topic?

fieldHint.hint1: Start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make more money speaking; get more sales; do more pullups; get more downloads; create a steady stream of innovative new ideas, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the 3rd thing the audience really wants related to the product, service, etc. topic?

fieldHint.hint1: Start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell more from the stage; get more shares and likes; do better on timed runs; increase your online visibility; stand out as the leader in your market, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is an emotional payoff your target audience really wants to HAVE?

fieldHint.hint1: Start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell a house without an agent; speak in front of huge paid audiences; ace any PT test like a boss, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is an emotional payoff your target audience really wants to GET RID OF?

fieldHint.hint1: Start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: tell your real estate broker to kiss off; stop speaking to small, uninterested audiences; stop struggling to barely pass your PT test every 6 months, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 big HOW TO your audience really wants?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to know (HOW TO) ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to market your home like a pro; how to get paid to speak; how to become a PT god; how to lose weight fast and keep it off, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's a negative event, circumstance, etc. you want to build your story around?

fieldHint.hint1: "Let me tell you a quick story about ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: the time I had to sell 2 houses myself in 30 days; when I got laughed off stage because I was so bad; how I failed my PT test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is something you were trying to do / accomplish at the time?

fieldHint.hint1: "At the time, I was trying to ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: move to Florida to take a big promotion; build my speaking business; make a great impression at my new unit and get a promotion, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is something you were struggling with at the time?"

fieldHint.hint1: I was struggling with ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: finding a buyer for two houses I owned; selling from the stage without being pushy; my pushup counts as well as my run times, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: As a result, what negative thing, emotion, or circumstance was putting your back up against the wall at the time?

fieldHint.hint1: "I was getting more and more ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: frustrated and scared; sick, frustrated and behind on my bills; disgusted with myself and my crappy fitness level, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's something bad that happened / occurred at this time that threw you off track?

fieldHint.hint1: "Then the bottom fell out from under me when ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: I had to get there in 30 days or they'd give the job to someone else; I was stranded in FL with no money; my CO told me I had 30 days to get squared away, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the thing you really needed to be able to do, but couldn't, when the event in the previous question happened?

fieldHint.hint1: "Which meant I couldn't ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: give my new family the life I promised them; even pay for a taxi to get home from the airport; keep my job if I didn't raise my score fast, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 thing your audience does NOT know how to do yet, but want to?

fieldHint.hint1: "Do you know how to ____?" (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get your home sold fast and for top dollar; get paid from the stage FAST; be ready for and ace every PT test anytime, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the first thing everyone tries to get results that doesn't work?

fieldHint.hint1: "So first I tried ____, and that didn't work!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sticking a sign in the yard; running ads on Facebook; killing myself in the weigt room, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is something everyone tries to get results that REALLY doesn't work?

fieldHint.hint1: "And I EVEN tried ____, and that was a total disaster!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: holding an open house every Saturday for a month; speaking for free at the local Chamber of Commerce; wrapping myself in plastic wrap from the kitchen pantry, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the NEXT thing everyone tries to get results that works a little it, but still sucks?

fieldHint.hint1: "So then I tried ____, and that worked a little bit!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: running an ad in the paper; hiring a speaker bureau; one of those fad diet supplements you see on TV, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the thing, method, etc. you discovered that changed it all?

fieldHint.hint1: "And that's when I finally tried ____ and it worked!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: leveraging social media to find a buyer; using a FREE book to fill my speaking gig funnel; periodization training and muscle confusion to kickstart my muscles, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Who is the enemy that's sabotaging everyone's results in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: Can be people or circumstances. (PLURAL) "The real enemy here are ____!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Realtors; speaker bureaus; BS personal trainers; traditional, outdated ideas about training for a test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the big lie the enemy tells that everyone believes?

fieldHint.hint1: "They want you to believe ____, but that's BS!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: you can't sell without an agent because you need the MLS; you can't get good speaking gigs without an expensive promoter; it takes months to get ready for a PT test, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big revelation you had in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "Then I finally figured out that ____, and everything changed!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: I could use social media to sell my house fast; I could use my own free book to get all the speaking gigs I could handle; I could get ready for a PT test in less than 2 weeks; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did this big revelation reveal to you?

fieldHint.hint1: "I discovered how to _____." (starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get other people to send me all the buyer leads I wanted; turn my book into a 24/7 "speaker booking machine"; drop my run times without logging 100's of painful miles, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the 2nd big thing you figured out from this big revelation?

fieldHint.hint1: "I also discovered how to _____." (starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get those buyers to compete for my house (NOT me begging them to buy); create sales messages that made promoters to beg me to speak; increase my pushups without injury, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the 3rd big thing you figured out from this big revelation?

fieldHint.hint1: "I even discovered how to _____." (starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: structure the deal so it was a "win win" for all parties; build my back end funnel so I made MORE money speaking; keep myself ready for any PT test at moment's notice, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How long did it take to figure all this out?

fieldHint.hint1: "This took ____ (TIME) to figure out and create."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: years of blood, sweat and tears; months of focused effort; weeks of trial and error; many sleepless nights, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How much did it cost to figure all this out?

fieldHint.hint1: "This cost ____ (MONEY) to figure out and create."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: over $100,000; tens-of-thousands of dollars in development cost; a whole month's salary, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the biggest roadblock you (and they) had to overcome in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "The biggest thing holding me back was ____." VERB ending in "ing"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: finding a qualified buyer for your house; getting booked for profitable speaking gigs; getting ready for a fast-approaching PT test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How long did it take to get results the OLD way?

fieldHint.hint1: "It used to take me ____ to get results the old way."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: at least 2 months; weeks of struggle; months of torture; days of mind-numbing effort, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How long does it take to get results with this NEW way?

fieldHint.hint1: "With this NEW way, now I get results ____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: in just a few minutes; in less than 15 minutes; whenever I want; in just 2 weeks or less; 100X faster, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 FEATURE (what it is) of your product, service, software, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: learn to write great classified ads; create the ultimate speaker one-sheet; emergency fitness training routine, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BENEFIT (what it does / means) of that #1 feature?

fieldHint.hint1: "With feature#1 you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: generate tons of buyer leads this weekend; instantly set yourself apart from every other speaker they're considering; reach passing levels for your test in a month or less, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #2 FEATURE (what it is) of your product, service, software, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: negotiate win-win contracts with nervous buyers; learn to creat the ultimate presentation to sell; know what to eat and drink before, during and after the fitness test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BENEFIT (what it does / means) of that #2 feature?

fieldHint.hint1: "Feature#2 means you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: avoid having a deal blow up in you face; make a ton of sales no matter how resistant the audience; instantly have the best energy levels for high performance, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #3 FEATURE (what it is) of your product, service, software, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: "Set the stage" for KILLER Showings to buyers; create order forms that sell "subconsciously"; learn the best way for your body to transition from one test to another, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BENEFIT (what it does / means) of that #3 feature?

fieldHint.hint1: "With feature#3 you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: put up the best first impression every time; use your handouts to make more money; reach peak efficiency and maximize your score, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #4 FEATURE (what it is) of your product, service, software, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: build a team of professionals to help you get your house sold; Learn 5 openers that instantly grab attention; specific ways to train smarter (not harder), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BENEFIT (what it does / means) of that #4 feature?

fieldHint.hint1: "Feature#4 means you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: have lawyers and bankers begging to help you; keep your audience's attention through the close; drop your mile pace without pain or risk of injury, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #5 FEATURE (what it is) of your product, service, software, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: discover how to use the Internet to sell your home; discover how to use social media to get a ton of speaking offers; specific training mistakes you must avoid, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BENEFIT (what it does / means) of that #5 feature?

fieldHint.hint1: "With feature#5 you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: leverage social media to find all the buyer you need; avoid the humiliation of begging for speaking gigs; prevent bad results on your PT test from killing your career, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Why should people believe you that your product / service delivers on the promises made?

fieldHint.hint1: One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list - can clean up / format later

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Include testimonials, statistics, screen shots, or facts to back up your claims

fields.fieldTitle: How much does your product, service, software, book, etc. cost compared to something else?

fieldHint.hint1: "For less than _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: a dollar a day; the cost of an everything pizza; the cost of a fancy dinner out on the town; the cost of a bargain bin DVD, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What do they get (Core Offer deliverables)?

fieldHint.hint1: List off everything they get! (BULLETED LIST 1 per line - No Limit!)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: 6 Module self-study video program; 4-part LIVE Webinar e-Class; 4-DVD Training set; Private FB Group; New Software; PDF Cheat Sheets, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's #1 BEST bonus you're including with your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Unlimited Buyer Traffic; Speaker Publicity Explosion; PT Mastery Super Class, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How much is this #1 BEST bonus worth in real dollars to them?
What's #2 bonus you're including with your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Outsourcing The Entire Home Sale Process; All My Speech Templates; How To Create A Home Gym for Under $100, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How much is this #2 bonus worth in real dollars to them?
What's #3 bonus you're including with your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 30 Minute Consult with Me Personally; 30 Minute Consult with My Top Speaking Coach; 30 Minute Video Coaching Assessment, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How much is this #3 bonus worth in real dollars to them?
How much is what you're selling worth?

fieldHint.hint1: TOTAL Up ALL Deliverables you just listed in the previous question.

fields.fieldTitle: How can you justify the this HUGE price of everything you just gave them?

fieldHint.hint1: "And it's worth every penny because _______"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: a broker would charge you a lot more than that to sell your house; just one speaking gig pays for the investment; your dream job / career depends on that PT test score, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the Special Price for what you're selling when_they_buy_TODAY?
What is the name of your "crazy" guarantee?

fieldHint.hint1: "I'm going to take on all the risk, and give you my ____ Guarantee"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell your house in 30 days; millionaire speaker; emergency PT test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the 3 biggest reasons your target audience should act on this now?

fieldHint.hint1: BULLET LIST - 3 Reasons - hit ENTER for each new line (Can do more than 3)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: The Internet has changed the Rules of real estate forever; a book sets you apart as an expert fast; if you fail that PT test, you probably won't get hired or promoted, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What do you want them to do as part of the Call To Action?

fieldHint.hint1: "Now I want you to ____." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: click the button below; fill out the form to the right; click the link, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: BULLET LIST steps of what happens next - One Step Per Line

fieldHint.hint1: For those who are already signing up, this is what's going to happen next: ____.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: you'll be taken to a secure download area, you'll create an account, you'll download all your bonuses, you can register for the live training, etc.
